content: **crocheted mushroom/christmas decoration in drops muskat theme christmas ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #dropsmerrymushrooms drops design pattern r-854 yarn group b ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** piece measures approx 11 cm vertically **yarn** drops muskat from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 50 g colour 12 red / 41 bordeaux / 87 pomegranate 50 g colour 83 pearl a mushroom weighs approx 20 g without filling **accessories** some cotton wool for filling optional strand for strap **crochet hook** drops crochet hook size 3 5 mm **crochet gauge** 20 double crochets in width and 20 row vertically on hook size 3 5 = 10 x 10 cm note remember that hook size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger hook if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller hook
